message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $115 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $105 is a bit lower than I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to come down to $110.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're still interested.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $108, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
